page.title: 11Holidaying in Leven.
page.content:
The holiday season in Leven starts on 25th of May and lasts until 1st of October.Almost 10,000 people come to Leven every summer.Accomodation is provided mostly in the form of bed and breakfast or caravans.There are two caravan sites,one on the promenade as well as one at Letham Glen. Holiday- makers also stay in Guest Houses or Hotels.
The main attractions are the beach, the Glen,the golf courses and local tours.The bus company arranges these tours.People are glad to come to Leven.They can make new friends and the local shop keepers are glad too because they make more money with the tourists buying things.Local people can also join in the walks and the other activities for the holiday makers.
